description:
Given a sentence, reverse the content of the sentence without reversing every word individually.

#### `Input Format:`
`The input consists of a sentence as a string.`

#### `Output Format:`
`Print the reversed content of the sentence.`

#### `Constraints:`
- `The sentence may contain letters, spaces, punctuation marks, and special characters.`
- `The length of the sentence does not exceed 10^5 characters.`

#### `Example:`
#### `Input:`
`Hello, how are you?`

#### `Output:`
`you? are how Hello,`

#### `Explanation:`
`The content of the sentence "Hello, how are you?" is reversed while keeping the words in their original order.`
title: Reverse Sentence Content
